  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111970</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111970</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Moje bralne navade</string>
            <string language="en">My reading habits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meine Lesegewohnheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mes habitudes de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meus hábitos de leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le mie abitudini di lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι συνήθειες ανάγνωσής μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mis hábitos de lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec na učnem listu pobarva za vsakodnevno 10 minutno branje eno od sličic.</string>
            <string language="en">Keeping track of student reading by coloring one of the picture on the sheet for every 10 minute reading.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bralne navade</string>
            <string language="en">reading habits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovenščina</string>
            <string language="en">slovene</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verfolgen Kursteilnehmermesswert durch die Färbung
der Abbildung auf dem Blatt für jeden minuziösen Messwert 10.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maintenir la lecture d'étudiant par le coloration 
de l'image sur la feuille pour chaque lecture 10 minute.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mantendo-se a par da leitura do estudante colorir 
do retrato na folha para cada leitura 10 minuciosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tenersi al corrente della lettura dell'allievo da 
quella di coloritura dell'immagine sul foglio per ogni lettura minuta 
10.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρακολουθώντας της ανάγνωσης σπουδαστών με το 
χρωματισμό μιας από την εικόνα στο φύλλο για κάθε μικρή 
ανάγνωση 10.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">No perder de vista la lectura del estudiante por el
colorear del cuadro en la hoja para cada lectura minuciosa 10.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesegewohnheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">slovene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">habitudes de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">slovène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">slovene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abitudini di lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">slovene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνήθειες ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
